Text: Sorry for the audio quality.  It seems that 2-channel 256kbps AC3 is the best Amazon provides.
Thanks for sharing :) Strange file size though?
Yeah, everything is more or less how it came from Amazon.  I just stripped out the DRM and converted from WMV to MKV.  The bitrates are exactly as I found them.
At last, finally a Web-Dl 720p version tyvm for sharing
oh sorry i didn't mean it in a bad way i meant it in a good way that there's finally a good release of this episode
Haha no worries m8, glad to share this amazing show.
i hope that you will be uploading the next episodes too :)

I get this weird sound lag when I try to play it in VLC. Like the audio cuts out completely for a fraction of a second and then returns, and this continues throughout the episode... Anyone got any ideas? :S
@herpaderpamerpa : It's not on your end, and it's definitely annoying. I'm currently d/ling the CtlrHD web-dl version to see if it's the same.
Sorry but "just converted from WMV to MKV with the same bitrate" means that you degraded the quality (Web-DLRip) with no gain.
